body:
replaces the --no-deps option

```
 $ spack install m4
...
 $ spack buildcache create -d ./only-deps --only dependencies -a --unsigned m4
...
 $ spack buildcache create -d ./only-pkg --only package -a --unsigned m4
...
 $ spack buildcache create -d ./both -a --unsigned m4
...
```
